response.original_title: Center for Ecoliteracy: California Food for California Kids
response.overview: The Center for Ecoliteracy advances school meal innovation and is pleased to introduce its California Food for California Kids initiative. Using the acclaimed Rethinking School Lunch planning framework and Cooking with California Food in K-12 Schools cookbook and professional development resource, the Center convenes food service directors from across California to support and inspire their work providing more fresh and freshly-prepared food for school children.
response.title: Center for Ecoliteracy: California Food for California Kids
